name: Phandalin
description: Frontier town of 40-50 log buildings, some on old fieldstone foundations. Surrounded by ruins from centuries ago when town was larger. Ruined manor on hillside. Children playing, people doing chores. Muddy main street.
atmosphere: Rough-and-tumble frontier settlement. Farmers, woodcutters, fur traders, prospectors. Terrorized by Redbrands for past 2 months. No local lord or real authority.
history: Founded centuries ago, destroyed by orcs 500 years ago when Wave Echo Cave was lost. Resettled 3-4 years ago by Neverwinter and Waterdeep folk. Now ~100-200 residents.
current_problem: Redbrand ruffians control town. Led by mysterious 'Glasstaff'. Extort businesses, bully citizens. Townmaster too intimidated to act.

stonehill_inn.description: Large new roadhouse, fieldstone and timber. 6 rooms for rent. Common room full of locals.
rumors: Sister Garaele left town wounded (from Narth)
Daran Edermath is former adventurer (from Elsa)
Orc raiders on Triboar Trail (from Lanar)
Redbrands murdered Thel Dendrar, took family (from Trilena)
Carp found secret tunnel, saw Redbrands (from Pip)
Redbrands don't hassle Miners Exchange - Halia too tough (from Freda)

barthens_provisions.description: Biggest trading post. Shelves stocked with ordinary goods.
barthens_provisions.services: General goods under 25 gp. No weapons/armor.
barthens_provisions.quest: Pay 10 gp each for wagon delivery. Concerned about Gundren.

edermath_orchard.key_npc: Daran Edermath - retired adventurer, half-elf fighter, 100+ years old, Order of Gauntlet member

lionshield_coster.description: Trading post with blue lion sign. Armor and weapons.
lionshield_coster.quest: Recover stolen goods from Cragmaw hideout
lionshield_coster.key_npc: Linene - sharp-tongued, age 35, won't sell to Redbrands

miners_exchange.description: Trading post for ore weighing/payment. Unofficial records office.
miners_exchange.key_npc: Halia - ambitious, calculating, secret Zhentarim agent
miners_exchange.information: Redbrands have goblin minion who might know Cragmaw Castle location
miners_exchange.ulterior_motive: Wants to take over Redbrand operation herself

alderleaf_farm.information: Carp found secret tunnel to Redbrand hideout (leads to Area 8)
alderleaf_farm.quest: Seek Reidoth the druid in Thundertree for help finding Cragmaw Castle

shrine_of_luck.description: Small shrine made from ruins stones.
shrine_of_luck.key_npc: Sister Garaele - zealous young elf, Harper agent
shrine_of_luck.quest: Ask Agatha the banshee about Bowgentle's spellbook

townmasters_hall.description: Stone walls, pitched roof, bell tower. Notice board outside.
townmasters_hall.key_npc: Harbin - fat, pompous, intimidated by Redbrands

sleeping_giant.description: Rundown tap house at east end of town.
sleeping_giant.danger: Redbrand hangout - encounter triggers here or in street

tresendar_manor.description: Ruined manor/castle on east hillside. 7 crumbling towers, upper floors collapsed.
tresendar_manor.entrance: Stone steps to terrace, bronze doors (corroded, collapsed)

redbrand_ruffians.trigger: After visiting several locations OR confronting at Sleeping Giant
redbrand_ruffians.tactics: Insult party, demand they leave town or hand over gear. Attack if refused.
redbrand_ruffians.development: If 1 survives, flees to Tresendar Manor. Can be captured for info.

redbrands_problem.recent_atrocity: Murdered Thel Dendrar, kidnapped wife and kids
